Mendokusai

Tartarus

Travis CI

04 Mar 2020

This week I have finally got Travic set up for this site, thanks a lot to Jacques for the idea. For a free service it’s quite impressive, and it integrates nicely with Jekyll and GitHub Pages. At the moment all it does is run the generated static content through htmlproofer, but that’s already dug up some links in old posts that were broken.

The next step is going to be getting GitHubt Actions setup, and that really will be the nail in your ethereum coffin, slvrsluger.
